project_context.key_goal: Effortless attendance tracking with high visibility

usage.ui_elements: IBM Plex Sans, font-medium, tracking-wide (uppercase for labels)

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous (2x standard). Use p-6, p-8 for containers.

structure.login_page: Split Screen. Left: Minimalist Form (40%). Right: Hero Image (60%).
structure.calendar_view: Custom Grid. 7 Columns. Rows auto-expand. Cells must have min-height (e.g., 120px).

customization_rules: Radius: rounded-lg (8px) for a friendly but professional look.
Shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-xl for modals.

specific_components.calendar: Use Shadcn Calendar for date picking in forms. Build a CUSTOM CSS Grid for the main monthly view.
specific_components.dialog: Use for 'Add Attendance' modal. Clean, focused, no clutter.
specific_components.avatar: Use for user profiles. Add a status indicator dot (green/amber/red) on the avatar ring.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only on sticky headers or modal overlays (backdrop-blur-sm bg-white/80).
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Hover on calendar cells: slight lift (-translate-y-1) and shadow increase.
visual_enhancers.empty_states: Use minimalist line icons or subtle illustrations for empty days.

images.description: Minimalist, bright contemporary office lobby. Sets a professional tone.

assets.icons: Lucide React (Default). Use thin strokes (stroke-width={1.5}) for elegance.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'Manrope' and 'IBM Plex Sans' via Google Fonts in index.css.
2. THEME: Configure tailwind.config.js with the 'Slate & Mint' palette.
3. LOGIN: Build the Login page first. Use the provided background image. Center the Google Login button.
4. DASHBOARD: Create the Sidebar + Main Content layout. Sidebar lists team members with status dots.
5. CALENDAR: The core feature. Do NOT use a tiny date-picker for the main view. Build a full-width CSS Grid (grid-cols-7) representing the month.
6. INTERACTION: Clicking a day opens a Dialog to set status (Present/Remote/Absent) and add a Note.
7. DATA: Mock the attendance data initially to visualize the grid population.
8. GREEK SUPPORT: Ensure fonts support Greek characters (Manrope/IBM Plex Sans do). UI text should be in Greek as per prompt.
universal_guidelines: Use 2x more whitespace than you think is necessary.
All interactive elements must have hover states.
Do not use gradients for text.
Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
